sentences: This meeting, which took place on 14-15 July 2014, in Berlin, Germany, met under the theme - Addressing the urgency - stepping up our contributions,' and aimed to discuss new strategies in preparation for the Lima Climate Change Conference.

The Dialogue focused on how to: reach consensus on key elements of the future climate regime, and adopt 'an ambitious, effective and fair climate agreement' in Paris in 2015; ensure all relevant states have submitted their INDCs for the 2015 climate agreement in a timely manner to enable compliance with the 2 °C limit; communicate that mitigation and adaptation measures benefit the economy; and create incentives to develop low-carbon technologies.
